name: Online Portal Service AG
overview:
Powerful mobile and web development, creative and usability, SEM, SEO and technology services

Online Portal Service AG creates positive change and stimulates dynamic growth in business. Zurich based company, is a leading enterprise digital solutions firm consisting of four experienced and specialized divisions: Mobile Development and Web Application Development Services, Creative and Usability Services, Marketing and Research Services (including SEM and SEO), and Technology Services.

Since 2010, Online Portal Service AG has been delivering the most advanced web application development and IT Technology in conjunction with superior design and lasting marketing concepts. This helps clients stand out from their competition, gain trust and loyalty from their customers and ultimately reach their target goals.
